snippet: Ilham Tohti, a scholar at a Beijing university who has been prevented from going to the United States, says that he is being closely watched by China’s security forces.
abstract: Ilham Tohti, outspoken ethnic Uighur scholar at a Beijing university who has been prevented from going to United States, says he is being closely watched by China’s security forces and that his Web site has been hacked.
lead_paragraph: Ilham Tohti, a scholar at a Beijing university who has been prevented from going to the United States, says that he is being closely watched by China’s security forces.
